channel.title: Fast help
channel.description: i need help fast i NEED to know how to ip ban somone i added there ip to bannedip.txt and tried ::ipbanuser (name) but neither of them ban his ip they just ban the user. i need to ip ban him!

item.title: Fast help

item.description:

ty so much it worked

Read full topic

item.title: Fast help
item.dc:creator: @Patrickftw Patrickftw
item.description:
@Patrickftw wrote:

Same, heres a way. Go to server.java and look for

					if (connectingHost.startsWith("computing") || connectingHost.startsWith("server2"))

This will block their IP:

					if (connectingHost.startsWith("computing") || connectingHost.startsWith("server2") || if (connectingHost.startsWith("computing") || connectingHost.startsWith("Their Ip Adress")

It works with me.

Read full topic
